author: sdeboy
msg: Moved classes in org.apache.chainsaw.rule to org.apache.rule and updated references.
Added serialversionuid to colorrule to support versioning more gracefully.
Updated build.xml to only build rule package with chainsaw target (has ORO dependency, which the core build doesn't currently need)

author: sdeboy
msg: Finished imlementation of load/save of color rulesets, although creation of new rulesets are not yet supported (only each panel's default color ruleset is saved).

author: psmith
msg: Refactored more of the View preferences into the PreferencesModel.

author: psmith
msg: Modified the way the LogPanel updates the filter when the user types
something in the Refine focus text box.
By using a background thread to delay the filtering until the user has
stopped typing, this defers costly filtering unnecessarily.
